description.originalText: Astrid has been a rock for our family for three years now!! When she first started sitting for us, our daughter was only four months old and our son was a super rambunctious three-year-old. From the first time she came, Astrid was so prepared, conscientious, and very loving with the kids. She handles everything with grace and I feel extremely confident leaving my kids in her care. She has done many overnights for us, early morning shifts, you name it. And our kids love her. Thank you Astrid!!

We love Astrid and we consider her our go-to babysitter.  She worked for us for several weeks during her winter break while we were searching for a full-time nanny and she ended up giving us a seamless transition once we found our nanny because she did everything (and more) for us that a professional nanny does, including helping us with organizing and light housekeeping when the children were napping.  At 5 PM our house and children were immaculate, and we had Astrid's full log of the day's meals, mealtimes, diaper changes and observations. Astrid is punctual, professional, highly intelligent and gifted with children.  We welcomed hearing her suggestions based on her observations and her experience.  We can't say enough good things about her and give her our highest recommendation.

description.displayText: Astrid is extremely trustworthy and responsible. In addition to those qualities she is warm, kind and creative. She took care of twin toddlers (girl and boy) with such a loving approach that they followed her like little ducklings- always wanting to be close and enjoying her " leadership ".  Astrid is also very patient and was able to captivate the kids with fun, and learning activities. She not only read to them, but helped them learn their ABC's and simple words. They didn't just "draw" pictures, she incorporated fun themes like let's draw the farm animals we read about today!  Astrid is a nurturing and compassionate person, and I would highly recommend her to anyone looking for help with childcare.

description.displayText: Astrid is a dependable and reliable caregiver. She is nurturing, caring and loving to all children. We had Astrid as a part of the family for many years. My twins at the time were toddlers and my oldest was around 7 years old. She took amazing care of all 3 and made it look seem less. We still keep in touch and the kids even though tweens and teens now, still think of her with affection.
